casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. DROUHARD
v.
MORROW CTY. BD. OF COMMRS. 2019-1043 Supreme Court of Ohio. July 30, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

Sua sponte, respondents ordered to file a response to the motion for an expedited issuance of an alternative writ or other emergency relief no later than 1:00 p.m. on Wednesday, July 31, 2019.
